name: Duceti City Rider
description:
This 3D game is all free, just download and playing this free 3D nice fantastic duceti monster motor bikes racing game.
You like sports, and your passion is high speed on highway with super sports duceti monster motor bikes, just play this free game. This is very basic of sports duceti monster motor bikes racing, rally free game.
Racing, rally your sports duceti monster super motor bikes with high speed, around racing road and nice fantastic environment, doing some more thrilling and relaxing with some more drifting your super sports motor bikes on racing highway is much funny and exciting. Just take your dream sports super duceti monster motor bikes and start your racing.

How to play
This game is very easy to play, with some simple buttons. Just press gas button and speed up your dreams sports duceti monster motor bikes on speedy highway. You're a highway star.
There's a gas button, auto break and change view control buttons to play, that's much easy to play
- Gas, break buttons to race your racing , rally super sports duceti monster motor bikes
- Swing your device to control your super sports duceti monster motor bikes steering
- Automatic gear of your racing , rally super sports duceti monster motor bikes
- Camera button to change your view of racing , rally super sports duceti monster motor bikes

Features:
- Amazing graphics of super sports duceti monster motor bikes , racing road fantastic environment
- Simple controls buttons with gas, auto break ones for racing, rally dream super sports motor bikes on racing road fantastic environment
- Swing your device to control your super sports duceti monster motor bikes
- Automatic controlling gear,break of your racing, rally super sports duceti monster motor bikes
- Camera button to change your vision of racing , rally super sports duceti monster motor bikes
